replies.body:
You are given 400 RP upon reaching level 3. I'm guessing that you used it up already on something you don't really want anymore? You may be able to use a refund token on it if it hasn't been too long and it meets the requirements.

Other than that, check out [Hextech Crafting](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html). It is in PBE now, but it is a system that gives you a way to get skins (or champions) for free.
